name: spin
description: Rotate the robot at specified/estimated angles and directions

angle.Description: Examined or reasonably estimated rotation angle (in degrees). Estimated based on 'back' = 180, 'side' = 90.

direction.Description: Estimated or stated rotation direction ('right' or 'left')

name: end
description: Used when meeting mission termination conditions, such as when the user has completed command execution / nothing more can be done

answer.Description: Report of completion of mission or reason for termination
